data.message:
I need Eminem to see this I hope you do my life is exactly like yours Andrew i struggle from many things I sit in my room writing songs the angry I get I listen to you music so I wrote a song and hope it will be published but probably not 😒 

song name: dont let her go 

hey, have you ever had a pain that you couldn't get rid of that one were you know your loved ones are really sick of,

whatever you do it's like it's killing you more you try to impress but your dropping to floor,

like you can make it stop your all alone so you pick up your phone try to call her even though you got the news that she gone

you can't help it so you get in the car you drive to the hospital and yell at them all "were is she cmon I really need to know" the nurse takes you there while your going down even more she opens the door she ses I'm sorry she couldn't take anymore"

you say thanks she closes the door she leaves, you go sit next to her trying not to pester her " please please no wake up I can do it without you I'm all alone now it's silent for hours your all alone,

so you close your visualising all the times saying I'm sorry I promise next time I'll be better stronger stay with you for longer it didn't work so you get closer and say.....I'm sorry all I wanted was to say was 

I love you 

(chorus) 
stay strong through hard a weak be by her side don't let her go don't say goodbye stay with her don't let her go coz if you do you don't know she might let you go 

stay with her forever don't take life for granted life the most till the end and never never never! let her go! 

beacuse you don't know 
don't know 
she might, she might,
you don't know 
don't know 

she might just let you go! 

end of song
